roleset.name: impelled action, brave
roleset.note: DARE-V NOTES: File for 'dare' based on financial subcorpus. Member of VNcls force-59. Comparison to urge. (from dare.01-v)
DARING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, dare-v.01. (from daring.01-j)

roles.note: Adjectival 'daring' not grammatical with arg1 (from daring.01-j)

example.name: linked impelled agent
example.text: [The Conservatives]-1 don't dare *trace*-1 jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...
example.arg: *trace*-1 jeopardize marginal Tory seats in Coventry, where Jaguar has headquarters...

example.name: with unlinked impelled agent
example.text: John dared Mary to kiss him.

example.name: Adjectival rel: daring; arg0
example.text: I tell ya , what I 'd really like to do is push the wall out a couple feet and put in a bath / shower , but I 'm not that handy or daring .

example.name: Adjectival rel: daring; args 0, 2, empty it
example.text: it was daring of them to feature Diane.
